title: Looking for some Coaching, trying to practice heaps befor next season
body: hey guys i was looking for someone that can help me climb out of my ELO and teach my some things, someone that can coach me by watching my games and all that stuff. if someone is able to help me i would be really grateful, and appreciate it so sooo much. :IGN: ( surferfijio ) {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

replies.body: You can find some great coaches on this site  https://www.lol-coaching.com (you can choose a coach specific to your role).  I have used this site and found it really helpful
